content: Hill-Rom Holdings Inc   a maker of hospital beds and surgical products  said it would buy privately held Welch Allyn for about $2.05 billion to expand into the point-of-care diagnostics market.
name: Hill-Rom Holdings Inc
title: Hill-Rom to acquire Welch Allyn for about $2.05 billion

content: June 17 Hill-Rom Holdings Inc  a maker of hospital beds and surgical products  said it would buy privately held Welch Allyn for about $2.05 billion to expand into the point-of-care diagnostics market.
name: Hill-Rom Holdings Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Hill-Rom to acquire Welch Allyn for about $2.05 bln

content: June 17 Hill-Rom Holdings Inc said it would acquire privately held Welch Allyn for about $2.05 billion to develop healthcare technologies for patients and caregivers.
name: Hill-Rom Holdings Inc
title: Hill-Rom to acquire Welch Allyn for about $2.05 bln
